characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily in the same lane. A cyclist appears from the right side, moving towards the road. The cyclists sudden appearance poses a potential danger.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is prepared to decelerate due to the cyclists sudden appearance from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving towards the road, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate.
